table_relationships.chat_conversations: Parent table for chat sessions. Referenced by chat_messages via conversation_id
table_relationships.chat_messages: Child of chat_conversations. Each message belongs to one conversation
table_relationships.affiliate_links: Tracking links created by affiliates. Referenced by leads via link_id
table_relationships.leads: Prospects/leads captured through affiliate links. Links to affiliate_links and tracks conversion status
table_relationships.affiliate_payments: Payment records for affiliates based on converted leads

common_query_patterns: Get all messages for a conversation: Query chat_messages GSI 'conversation_id-created_at-index'
Get user's conversations: Query chat_conversations GSI 'user_id-created_at-index'
Get affiliate's leads by status: Query leads GSI 'affiliate_id-status-index'
Get pending payments: Query affiliate_payments GSI 'status-created_at-index' with status='pending'
